name: test-json-module
description: Simple test module for JSON-based dynamic module creation

tools.name: greet
tools.description: Generate a greeting message for a given name
tools.function: async function greet(params) { const { name = 'World' } = params; return { success: true, message: `Hello, ${name}!`, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }; }

tools.name: add_numbers
tools.function: async function addNumbers(params) { const { a, b } = params; if (typeof a !== 'number' || typeof b !== 'number') { return { success: false, error: 'Both a and b must be numbers' }; } const result = a + b; return { success: true, result, operation: 'addition', operands: [a, b] }; }
